General_Description: '''Burned Men and Broken Skulls''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "The [[bandit]]s burn everything in their way and kill [[civilian]]s for no reason. They should feel what it's like to be burned alive and crushed to dust."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed bandits with [[Staff|staves]], [[Bow|arrows]], and fire all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
